column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This is a great spot for chilling with your friends. The people are extremely customer service
column2: but super Cool. The drinks are on point...And the food is what it should be
column3: delish. I tasted the catfish & grits
column4: the pork with polenta and the short rib and I loved them all equally. Â The portions were plenty
column5: we could not finish them and I forgot we had the cornbread appetizer
column6: which were extremely lite for cornbread
column7: delicious but different. This a great spot to really unwind on a Friday after work...
